about_the_game:
Slumpunk is a multiplayer online TPS game set in the 22nd century. In this shooting game decorated with a cyberpunk theme, we offer a "fast" game full of adrenaline and action. It is a great game that is constantly growing with updates, improvements and developments.
How about joining the adventure?
Fire! Lets go.
Online PvP and PVE team battles,
The most popular FPS/TPS and Battle Royale game models,
Gun Race, Elimination, Capture the Flag, Cover Point, Team Death Match.
Player and Weapon customization,
In-game Shopping Store,
Clan System,
Player Level System
Class System,
... and many more features to be added.

content_descriptors.notes:
This is an FPS/TPS survival shooting game. For this reason, there are scenes such as gunfights.
It does not contain sexual content. There is no content such as alcohol or drugs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770/AMD FX-8350 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB/AMD Radeon R9 290 4GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Online multiplayer third person shooter game in the Cyberpunk realm. Fascinating cityscapes, futuristic weapons, Cyberpunk characters. It's all in this sweet polygon style game.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
